# sspanel_node (Resource)

SSPanel node



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Node name
- `server` (String) Node server details
- `sort` (Number) Node type

### Optional

- `bandwidth_limit` (Number) Node bandwidth limit
- `bandwidth_reset_day` (Number) The day that bandwidth limit reset
- `class` (Number) Node class requirement
- `group` (Number) Node group
- `info` (String) Node remark for user
- `mu_only` (Number) Node for multiuser
- `node_ip` (String) Node real ip
- `rate` (Number) Traffic rate
- `speedlimit` (Number) Node speedlimit
- `status` (String) Node status text
- `type` (Boolean) Is node enabled

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Node id
